name: Orange Dog
description:
Platform game in a cyberpunk universe which you control a dog it likes to eat oranges to up your score.  Go fast before the cyber spider capture the orange dog.

Controls:

Movements:

Left =  A (keyboard) or Left analogic stick or dpad (xbox controller) 

Right = B (keyboard) or left analogic stick or dpad (xbox controller)

Jump = Space (keyboard) or A (xbox controller)
